# googleshiny

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of googleshiny is to give an example of Google OAuth in Shiny adapted from https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/googleAuthR/vignettes/google-authentication-types.html#gar_shiny_-functions-example

See example app at https://jhubiostatistics.shinyapps.io/googleshiny/
